New Orleans, January 10, 1852.
Meeting of the Permanent Committee of the N. 0. and Opelousas Railroad,)
Monday, January 9, 1852. I
Judge Overton, of St. Landry, presented the following resolution, which va
unanimously adopted:
Resolved, That W. M. Burwell, of Virginia, be and he is hereby respectfully request^

A true copy from the Minutes.

Verandah Hotel, |
New Orleans, January 12,1852.)
